entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Meadow Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:26 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -14.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Meadow Lake Airport 10:45 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -14.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -16.6°C
Wind: ESE 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
